title: Prince William's all smiles as he puts Kate photo row behind him and prepares for Harry 'reunion' | Flipboard
text: Prince William's all smiles as he puts Kate photo row behind him and prepares for Harry 'reunion' The Prince of Wales looked on top form during a visit to a youth charity today (Thursday, 14 March) ahead of a 'reunion' with Prince Harry to … Related storyboards Related articles [Prince William Presents at Diana Legacy Awards Ahead of Harry’s Planned Appearance](/@usweekly/celebrity-news-aae7v27iz/prince-william-presents-at-diana-legacy-awards-ahead-of-harry-s-planned-appearan/a-FGPzwJC2SzqZWFlOzTe3RA%3Aa%3A3195443-609442f223%2Fusmagazine.com) Prince William and Prince Harry both made appearances at the Diana Legacy Awards in honor of their late mother, Princess Diana. William, 41, was on hand … [American Riviera Orchard: What you can expect from Meghan Markle's new brand](/@hellomagazine/top-stories-03ptkosjz/american-riviera-orchard-what-you-can-expect-from-meghan-markle-s-new-brand/a-cwV4FwoJQHS6AFQWEq48Dg%3Aa%3A2139388226-21aaf80de5%2Fhellomagazine.com) Meghan Markle's entrance into the world of e-commerce with her own brand was always bound to be an event which was eagerly anticipated by fashion … [Kate Middleton Photographer Addresses New Editing Claims as Photos Are Analyzed](/@cosmopolitan/celeb-news-isqpcbjsz/kate-middleton-photographer-addresses-new-editing-claims-as-photos-are-analyzed/a-N-U0Ae6qTjm8tbdx2iNqVg%3Aa%3A16801122-b094882b77%2Fcosmopolitan.com) Have you spent the past 48 hours spiraling over brick patterns? This is for you. Thanks to Kate Middleton's, um, adventurous experiments in the world of photoshop, there's been some mistrust when it comes to images of The Princess of Wales.
